title: Executive Order 5467-Reservoir-Site Restoration No. 10, California
content: So much of the order of June 8, 1926, creating Reservoir-Site Reserve No. 17, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 1 S., R. 15 E., sec. 27, SW. ¼ of SE. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5467-Reservoir-Site Restoration No. 10, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361089
